title: Does my name look weird to you guys?
body: I logged into my account from a long time ago and it seems like someone changed my name!?! Is there any way to fix this??

replies.body: Yeeeaaaaa looks like someone might have hacked your account and changed the Summoner Name. Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can so they can take a look for you!
